oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis and Functionalization of BF2-Complexes of meso-Free 25-Oxasmaragdyrin
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KALITA, H
LEE, WZ
RAVIKANTH, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: EXPANDED PORPHYRIN
SMARAGDYRINS
COMPLEXES
CORROLE
ARRAYS
ANION
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: BF2-complex of meso-free 25-oxasmaragdyrin is synthesized under simple reaction conditions in high yield, and the reactivity of mesa-free carbon atom was demonstrated by carrying out functionalization followed by coupling reactions.
